participant_1.background:
I am not sure if my co-worker likes me, but I have a dog named Max.
I start my day early, walk my dog, and then work on my tasks until late at night, listening to music about animals.
I have a computer that can play rap music loudly so I can dance with my dog.
I hope my friends and family are doing well.
i have four siblings.

participant_2.background:
I spend a lot of time reading and researching weird and wonderful things.
I spend my weekends learning about the universe.
i have ink stains on all my shirts.
i like reading mystery novels.
I'd love to explore the country side with my lifted Chevy truck and practice my Italian.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do in your spare time?
Hi there! I really enjoy reading. I love learning about new things and exploring the world.
That's really cool! I like reading too. I usually read mystery novels or books about science.
Oh wow! I love mystery novels too. Do you have a favorite author?
I do! My favorite author is Agatha Christie. I love her mysteries because they're so well-written and suspenseful.
I love Agatha Christie too! She's my favorite mystery author as well. Have you read any of her books about Hercule Poirot?
I have! I've read all of her Poirot books and I love them. They're so well-written and the characters are so interesting.
I agree! I love Poirot. He's such a great character. I've also read a lot of her Miss Marple books and I really like them too.
I've read a few of her Miss Marple books too and I like them. They're not quite as suspenseful as her Poirot books, but they're still really good.
I agree. They're not as suspenseful, but they're still great mysteries. I'm glad to meet someone else who loves Agatha Christie!
Me too! She's my favorite author.
I'm glad to hear that. She's definitely one of my favorites too.
